entry.title: Poles Are Voting in What Could Be Europe's Biggest Election This Year
entry.content: Support for Ukraine has emerged as a core campaign issue, with an upstart party driving the debate to the right.

entry.title: Desperate to Flee Africa, Migrants Accidentally Stow Away on Ships to Brazil
entry.content: African arrivals are tricked to believe they were headed for the U.S. or Europe.

entry.title: U.S. Push to Evacuate Americans From Gaza Falters Amid Egyptian Demands
entry.content: Egypt wants a deal for aid to Gaza before allowing foreigners to exit, officials say. Meanwhile, Palestinians are offered temporary travel corridor to southern Gaza.

entry.title: U.S. Presses Arab Leaders to Help Prevent Escalation
entry.content: Making rounds of regional capitals, Secretary of State Antony Blinken asked officials to isolate Hamas and deter Hezbollah from violence.

entry.title: Hamas Fighters' Orders: 'Kill as Many People as Possible'
entry.content: Documents found on dead militants after last weekend’s assault on Israel indicate massacres were a central objective.

entry.title: Israel Aims to Destroy Hamas. What Comes Next for Gaza Is Unclear.
entry.content: Israel is preparing a ground invasion of the Gaza Strip to destroy Hamas. But it hasn’t offered any indication of what could happen next.

entry.title: Inside Gaza, People Desperately Seek Safety
entry.content: An evacuation warning from the Israeli military sowed panic in the sealed-off Palestinian enclave.
